Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Storm \Storm\, v. t. [imp. & p. p. {Stormed}; p. pr. & vb. n. {Storming}.] (Mil.) To assault; to attack, and attempt to take, by scaling walls, forcing gates, breaches, or the like; as, to storm a fortified town. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Storming \Storm"ing\, a. & n. from {Storm}, v. [1913 Webster]
{Storming party} (Mil.), a party assigned to the duty of making the first assault in storming a fortress. [1913 Webster]
